wikipedia_page.main:
Garry Fleming (born 17 May 1987), is a Scottish footballer, predominately a midfielder or striker, he is currently in his second spell at Carluke Rovers, who play in the West of Scotland League.
Fleming, started his career with Albion Rovers, and has also played for Bellshill Athletic, Irvine Meadow, Dumbarton, Alloa Athletic and Kilwinning Rangers.
